word: Bible Study Gives Power to the Mind. [SEE CHAPTER 11, "BIBLE STUDY AND THE MIND."]--Those who hunger for knowledge that they may bless their fellowmen will themselves receive blessing from God. Through the study of His Word their mental powers will be aroused to earnest activity. There will be an expansion and development of the faculties, and the mind will acquire power and efficiency.--COL 334 (1900).
